title: Minimal Carbon Emissions from Waste
description: In 2023, Mauritius reported a remarkably low carbon dioxide emission from waste, amounting to just 0.0001 Mt CO2e, showcasing its commitment to sustainable waste management.

title: Low Military Expenditure
description: Mauritius allocated only 0.52% of its general government expenditure to military spending in 2023, reflecting its focus on non-military priorities.

title: Limited Aid from Sweden
description: In 2021, Mauritius received a minimal net bilateral aid flow from Sweden, totaling approximately $10,000, indicating limited financial dependency on Swedish aid.

title: Low Benefit Incidence to Poorest Quintile
description: In 2017, only 3.85% of unemployment benefits and active labor market programs in Mauritius reached the poorest quintile, highlighting a need for more equitable distribution.
